transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ravinder ji.
Customer: Ji sir boliye.
Executive: Sir ji Shubham baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Main ye bol raha tha sir ki dekho maine apne level pe process to ki hai kuch cheeze.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapke refund ke liye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kuch cheeze process karai hai. But still final approval hamare usme ek final approval hamare HOD ka lagta hai, Head of the Department ka sir jo VP hai hamare, Vice President sir hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To unhe approval ke liye dala hai sir. Agar waha se approval aa gaya to fir to process ho jayega sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To humne dala hai sari cheeze likh ke humne waha pe approval dala hai. Abhi to humne team ko escalate kiya tha to waha se to nahi hua. Fir maine apne level pe jo mere Head of the Department hai maine unhe dala sari cheeze dikhai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur aapne jo mere ko bataya tha ki aapke yaha pe jo aapne matlab aapke bete ke liye aapne kiya tha aur aapke bete study ke liye chale gaye hai. To koi take care karne ke liye nahi hai IndiaMART. Yahi hai na sir aapne bataya tha mere ko.
Customer: Bilkul theek.
Executive: Ji to maine ye bhi bata diya ki client ne jo hai apne bete ke liye liya tha aur wo bete jo hai take care kar rahe the lekin ab unke bete jo hai wo padhai ke liye aage studies ke liye aage chale gaye hai. Abhi waha pe koi nahi hai ki IndiaMART take care kar paye. Dusra ek ye bhi commitment tha ki confirmed leads aapko milenge.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye bhi commitment tha na sir.
Customer: To maine dono cheeze dal ke sir ki to hai.
Executive: Ek bar sir mere pass final update kal tak aa jayega.
Customer: Achha theek hai.
Executive: Kal tak main aapko is kar dunga. Theek hai na Ravinder ji.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Baki sir aap mere ko allow kariye ye customer care pe ticket open rehta hai to ye process ruk jata hai. Ye main close kar de raha hu. Kal main wapas samne se call karke aapko iske liye update karunga. Aap bechint rahiye.
Customer: Theek hai. Abhi mere ko kuch karna hai kya ticket batao kya karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapko aapko sir bas aap ruko main aapko dikha bhi deta hu aapko agar waisa thoda lag raha ho.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko koi nahi aapne bol diya to pura trust hai sir kya baat kar di aapne. Aap jo bataoge sahi bataoge.
Executive: Ji bilkul main sir wo wala person nahi hu dekho agar jo cheez possible hoti hai wahi main batata hu jabki jab tak koshish ki hai sir but dekhte hai ki kaha tak nahi aap shuru se deal sahi kar rahe ho usme koi wo dorai nahi hai ki main aapko galat thehra hu lekin jo galat tarike se jo baat kar rahi thi wo banda to alag hi tha aapko shayad pata hoga naam nahi mere ko pata wo unka baat karne ka jo tarika tha wo theek nahi tha to aapki to baat pe mere ko pura vishwas hai aisa koi nahi hai aap jo bologe wo kar denge hum aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Ravinder ji aap apna wo open kariye dekho whatsapp main aapko sir dekho fir bhi clarity aapke pass honi chahiye ek bar check kariye.
Customer: Whatsapp open kariye ek bar aap apna.
Executive: Aap dekhoge to ye maine abhi mere Prabhat sir jo hai mere manager hai Prabhat Ranjan ji se maine wo dalwaya hai 3:30 pe 3:30 pe abhi 3:30 baje ki bhai ek bar refund ke liye dalo dobara.
Customer: To.
Executive: Dekhte hai sir agar approval aayega to main aapko bataunga nahi aayega kuch agar aisa aaya update to wo bhi aapko main jarur bataunga. Aap mujhe kal tak ka time dijiye please.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Aur main sir ye concern close kar de raha hu aapke pass feedback mail aayega please sir use satisfied mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Satisfied nahi karna hai?
Executive: Satisfied mark kar dijiyega satisfied kar dijiyega sir wo mere liye aata hai main jo effort kar raha hu wo mere liye hota hai.
Customer: Koi nahi aap bhej do main kar deta hu.
Executive: Use satisfied mark kar dijiyega mere liye kuch likhna chahe ki Shubham is giving good service ya kuch aisa to aap likh sakte hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai bhej do. Theek hai na theek hai okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a refund.

- Customer had issues with previous executive.



Resolution:

- Executive escalated the refund request to HOD.

- Executive assured a final update by tomorrow.

- Executive requested to mark feedback mail as satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer with an update.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, hod, feedback, escalation, whatsapp
